oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A QUASI-3D MATHEMATICAL MODEL OF COASTAL MORPHOLOGY
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: de Vriend, H.J.
Ribberink, J.S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: coastal morphology
quasi 3D model
mathematical model
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A semi-analytical model of 3D nearshore currents and sediment transport is presented. It describes the tidal motion, the waves, the surfzone currents and the sediment transport in complex coastal areas. The results of a first application, to a well-documented case at the Dutch coast, indicate the potential and the shortcomings of the model. The latter are analysed and suggestions for improvement are given.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 125
